meanings.definition: The condition of having six sets of chromosomes in a cell.
meanings.sent1: Hexaploidy can result in increased genetic diversity.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the hexaploidy of the cell under a microscope.
meanings.sent3: The hexaploidy of the cell made it a genetic powerhouse.
meanings.sent4: Her garden bloomed with the hexaploidy of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The hexaploidy of the cell was like a symphony of genetic information.
